Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.manageExceptions

Class ControllerExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.manageExceptions.ControllerExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class ControllerExceptionHandler extends Object
Controller advice class to handle exceptions thrown by controllers.

    • handleCustomException

      @ExceptionHandler(CustomException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorApi> handleCustomException(CustomException e)
      Handles CustomException and returns an ErrorApi response.
      Parameters:
      e - the CustomException thrown
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with ErrorApi and HTTP status

    • handleError

      @ExceptionHandler(java.lang.Exception.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorApi> handleError(Exception e)
      Handles general exceptions (Exception.class). Builds and returns an ErrorApi response with the exception message and a 500 Internal Server Error status.
      Parameters:
      e - the Exception thrown
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the ErrorApi and a 500 status

    • handleMethodArgumentNotValidException

      @ExceptionHandler(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ErrorApi> handleMethodArgumentNotValidException(org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException e)
      Handles validation exceptions (MethodArgumentNotValidException) and returns a 400 Bad Request response.
      Parameters:
      e - the exception thrown
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with ErrorApi and a 400 status
